kubernetes_limit_range.description: Limit Range sets resource usage limits (e.g. memory, cpu, storage) for supported kinds of resources in a namespace.

metadata.description: Standard limit range's metadata. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#metadata)

spec.description: Spec defines the limits enforced. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status)
